items.text: full on off, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: length on middle, pushed to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, comes down the wicket and hammers it through the covers for four
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the pads, flicked straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: length on the pads, clipped to deep squareleg's left for a couple
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 2 runs

items.text: length on middle, Hope swivels to pull but it keeps quite low and he misses. There's an appeal for lbw, turned down, however
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run
Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run
Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full toss outside off, freebie and he pounces on it. Didn't try to hit it too hard, just placed it wide of extra cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, FOUR runs

items.text: length on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length outside off and a glorious way to bring up his hundred! Punched off the backfoot, superbly timed and through extra cover for four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the pads, pushed to squareleg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: full on middle, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: length on middle, goes back and works it straight to squareleg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: length outside off, nearly chops it back on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: full on the pads, clips it to short fine-leg's left to bring up his fifty with a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, cut away powerfully but straight to deep cover, they considered a second but Chase slipped as he turned at the non striker's end
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, chipped between deep midwicket and long-on for a couple
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: length outside off, slower ball and Hope drills it on the up, through extra cover for another boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball on off, lofted over the bowler's head but can't beat long-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: timely wicket! He came down the track, Mashrafe adjusted his length, banged it in short, Chase still wanted to pull it away, only managed a top edge to short fine-leg, who circled around it briefly but took it safely in the end
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, OUT

dismissal.text: RL Chase c Mustafizur Rahman b Mashrafe Mortaza 51 (85m 62b 2x4 1x6) SR: 82.25

items.text: short one at the body, ducks under it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: full on off, comes forward and works it to midwicket by turning the face
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Carter, no run

items.text: length outside off, steered to short third-man
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Carter, no run
